DOC.brief_title: Comparisons Clinical Outcomes Between Novel Tailored Transvaginal Mesh Surgery Vaginal Native Tissue Repair Surgery Pelvic Organ Prolapse
DOC.detailed_description: Hypothesis / aim study : The use mesh woman pelvic organ prolapse ( POP ) remain debate , despite recent randomize trial report favourable anatomic outcome transvaginal mesh ( TVM ) surgery cystocele , compare anterior colporrhaphy . Besides , issue preserve uterus woman POP operation still undetermined . Thus , aim study compare clinical outcome novel tailor TVM surgery conventional transvaginal native tissue repair ( NTR ) surgery POP . Study design , material method : Between November 2011 September 2014 , medical record consecutive woman underwent POP surgery medical centre review . The choice surgery method accord surgeon ' preference . Clinical characteristic intraoperative data postoperative clinical outcome record . Wilcoxon rank-sum test use compare data two group . Kaplan-Meier survival analysis use compare recurrence rate two group .
